Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.diary.core

Class Diary

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.diary.core.Diary
public class Diary extends Object
A class providing some basic interface to operate with a diary, stored in an external Json-file (see toJson(File), fromJson(File).

Allows to insert(String, String) a new Note with a specified heading and text and an actual date of creation, remove(String) notes with a specified heading, get pretty representation of all entries via toString().

Diary.Query nested class gives a functionality to filter notes that belong to this Diary.

See Also:
